duties_responsibilities.duty: Support a team with assigned tasks, projects, and various administration tasks.
Develop, maintain, and monitor accurate and complete files for projects and programs.
Communicate issues to management prior to reaching critical status.
Assist with administrative preparation and coordination for meetings and events.
Prepare and submit purchase orders and process contractor invoices for various office management functions.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent. Associate degree or equivalent work experience preferred.
